name: Grabbing Style

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Grapple; base attack bonus +6, brawler's flurry class feature, or flurry of blows class feature.

sections.text: When you use this style, you do not take a –4 penalty on combat maneuver checks to grapple a foe with only one hand. Additionally, you do not lose your Dexterity bonus to AC while pinning an opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: Without two hands free, you take a –4 penalty on the combat maneuver roll to grapple a foe. While pinning a foe, you lose your Dexterity bonus to AC.
sections.name: Normal

prerequisites: base attack bonus +6, brawler's flurry class feature, or flurry of blows class feature
description: You are adept at the one-handed grab.
